summary: SummaryGhd's professional triple barrel waver is perfect for creating easy and loose beach waves quickly that last all day, with no extreme heat damage* using its ghd advanced technology.
details: DetailsBenefitsPerfect for effortless and crease-free beach waves that lasts all day2x less frizz* and 30% more shine*No extreme heat damage*FeaturesRe-designed ergonomic barrels with professional anodised coating for reduced weight and improved control when stylingghd advanced technology with dual temperature sensors to consistently monitor the optimum styling temperature of 365°F50 second heat up time with beep soundCool tip for added controlItem 2639019How To UseSection hair and take a 3-inch horizontal section.Place ghd wave upside down at the root.Hold for 3-8 seconds and remove.Place right side up.Hold for 3-8 seconds and remove.Repeat technique until the ends.Caution: Keep out of reach of children.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Section hair and take a 3-inch horizontal section.Place ghd wave upside down at the root.Hold for 3-8 seconds and remove.Place right side up.Hold for 3-8 seconds and remove.Repeat technique until the ends.Caution: Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Good waver
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I found it was very easy to use and heat up very quickly . It was very durable but it would be heavy to travel with. I did like the design, but burned myself using it. I would recommend it to my friends.

reviews.headline: Large waver!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I am obsessed with the waves this barrel gives! It is very large so I can do all of my hair pretty quickly. Nice design and easy to use. Will be recommending to everyone!

reviews.headline: Great to get wavy hair
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a great tool. I used it on my tween for school and it did not take long to get her hair wavy! It's works well and the heat settings are easy to understand!

reviews.headline: Easy to use hot tool
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Works great I'm just very new to the product so i have to learn what works for me when using this hot tool. At the beginning I thought the hot tool was pretty heavy but when I was doing my hair I didn't find it that heavy to use. It does get very hot and you're not able to change the temperature but besides that I love it.

reviews.headline: Cute retro waves
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This tool heats up quickly, and has an alarm when it's ready. There is also an auto shut off after 60 minutes. It's a solid tool which makes it a little heavy, but the soft touch silicone on the end and the back (to set on the counter when needed) makes it manageable. All edges are smooth so there aren't any issues with hair getting caught. 

It takes a little practice, but you can create pretty, soft waves that have a bit of a retro feel, or leave the curl tighter for a finger curl look. There is only one heat setting, so take that into account when timing each curl. 

All in all this is pretty fun to play with, and it can be used to make many different styles.

reviews.headline: High end wave iron
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a very substantial piece of equipment. I did not realize how heavy it would be. I found that made it more difficult to maneuver. That being said, it only took about 15 minutes to do my whole head. It was also super quick to heat up. It was less than a minute and it plays a chime to let you know it's ready! Loved that. It maintains a steady 365 degree temperature, so it shouldn't burn your hair, but I used a heat defense spray just in case. It does have a substantial lip that juts out, which could be a burn concern. This did what it was supposed to and gave waves. Somehow I was expecting more loose curls. Other than that, this was a success. This is a very high end iron. I am hoping with a little practice I can refine the look a bit.

reviews.headline: Bulky and slow to curl
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This ghd Wave Triple Barrel Waver is a decent waver/curler option. I don't love it however, because of its size and the amount of time it takes to get a good wave. Maybe it's just not ideal for thick hair. It is a bulky curler that doesn't fit conveniently in some drawers. It takes a considerable amount of time to get a good wave and sometimes a second pass is required.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love this hair waver so much! It leaves my hair so wavy, similar to what a hair crimper would do. It is so easy to use and doesn't make my hair feel damaged at all.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This item is heavy. If you aren't used to doing hair it maybe too much for you. But the weight makes it feel durable. It gets hot quickly and it's fast and easy to use. My short hair was don't in less then 10 minutes. It leaves a nice wave!

reviews.headline: Works okay
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This tool is quite heavy and hard to use. It does heat up quickly. It is easy to place your hair inside it and glide through it. Although this hair tool might work for others, it did not work for my hair. It might not have worked for my hair because I have thinner, with a slightly wavy texture to it already. It might work better for me on days when my hair hasnt been recently washed because that is when I tend to lose my waves in my hair. This might help bring back texture to my hair. Easy to use button to turn on and off. Bulky, but get the job done.

reviews.headline: Beautiful beach waves!
reviews.comments: I really love this waver, I've been looking for one for awhile and this one really had great results! It has one heat setting at 365 degrees it heats up in 50 seconds so there's no long wait time.  I thought it made such beautiful beachy waves!!

reviews.headline: A good tool to add to my collection
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have never used a 3 barrel curling iron before but i have had a lot of fun figuring it out! On a day when my hair is frizzy and unruly this is such a quick fix to have my hair look internally styled. The waves are large and relaxed and very pretty. I think this will fit into my routine really well! It is easy to use, heats up quickly and works fast!

reviews.headline: Easy, beachy waves—but with a learning curve.
reviews.comments: I tried the waver tool on my shorter, naturally curly hair, and while I love the simple wave look it gives, it definitely has some drawbacks. The barrel is much larger than I'm used to, and I ended up burning my hand and ear while trying to maneuver it, especially when reaching the back of my head. Since I couldn't adjust the heat (it only has an on/off button), it took a little longer to smooth through my curls. That said, it was quick overall and I think it will be even easier to use once my hair is longer. I'll keep trying to perfect it!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This iron heats up fast and beeps when it is at optimum temperature. It's very light in weight and easy to use. It gives really nice beachy messy waves! Love!

reviews.headline: LONG lasting style!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The best thing about this triple barrel waver is how long my waves last. I have fine hair that often will not hold a curling iron curl for longer than a few hours, even with hair prep and hair spray. This waver is incredibly fast, as you only need to hold the waver on each section of hair for about 5 seconds. So, I can style my hair with no prep or hairspray in under 10 minutes and have the style last until I wash my hair again. There is a bit of a learning curve with the styling process, in order to avoid making it look to "done" or uniform. But, once you get used to the waver (it's a bit heavy!!) and how to work it with your hair, the results are fantastic. I can tell that this waver is of incredible quality, which doesn't surprise me because GHD makes excellent products. The only thing that makes me give it 4 stars instead of 5 is the heat setting—it's not adjustable. GHD says that they designed the waver to be used at one heat setting that will not overly damage your hair while giving great results. As I have mentioned, my hair is fine so I would appreciate a lower heat setting option. But, I do appreciate the research that went into picking a temperature that they thought might work for all. If there were more heat settings, I would give this 5 stars in a heartbeat. An excellent option for anyone looking for a waver or a hot tool that will give them a lasting style.

reviews.headline: Gets hair done in a jiffy
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My wife tried the ghd triple barrel wave tool.
It is made well and easy to use.  It is rather large in size. That was a good thing because you can style more hair faster, but it is rather hard to hold and if you use for traveling.
It did an ok job at styling. She said it was better for natural waves .

reviews.headline: Easy to use - adds some fun to your hair
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have never used a styling tool such as this before. I have only ever used a flat iron when I went through a phase of wanting pin straight hair. Typically when I do my hair I just let it air dry or I brush it while blowdrying. 
I have used this waver about 10 times since getting it. I still don't think I'm very good with it, but I felt it was time to review. In these before and after photos, my hair is 4 days post wash and I had blow dried it. I used a heat protectant spray. Otherwise, nothing else. 
I find this easy to use and obviously makes a fun difference in your hair. I find that it doesn't last for the next day, but I don't put in anything to hold it. 
It is a bit heavy but you won't be using it long to cause fatigue. 
I'll continue using this!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this waver!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I absolutely love this waver! It's nice and wide for my long hair. It is light weight and easy too hold with one hand while using. I love the light and sound with the heat on and off. It does a great job at waving and my waves hold all day. Absolutely recommend!

reviews.headline: Nice wave with long hair
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I like the design and handle, but  you need to be really careful with it though. I have short hair so not sure if it work best with short hair but still, I really want to get some wave but might have to grow it more I think. It is an ok wave, just best to work with long hair.

reviews.headline: Impressive!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The wave triple barrel waver from GHD (Good Hair Day) is absolutely stunning!! It has a sleek matte finish, the packaging is simple and professional, and the waver itself works wonderfully!! The barrel is large, so you complete your look in half the time!! In a hurry? This beauty heats up in record timing and can be easily taken to and from! Absolutely love it!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] 
I love this hair waver! This GHD wave triple barrel waver gives you volume instantly, it doesn't cause frizzy waves, and it is very effective at giving you the full, waved, beach hair look in minutes. Also, the waver just looks sleek and professional. Straight out the box I said out loud "oOh that's nice!"

Pros- Lots of pros! It has a coated end to protect you from burning your fingers while holding it. It heats up quickly and it lets you know with a beep when it is heated fully. It doesn't take long to do my whole head. It took about 15 minutes for the whole head and I have rather long hair. 

I like that it has large barrels and it gives you loose waves rather than looking like the 80s electrocuted look. The waver is easy to operate and easy to hold. Fits nicely in my hand and I don't feel like I would easily drop it. I can easily hold it at different angles without any issues, and it works either way (barrel side up or upside down.)I like that it has the cord that does a 360 turn so I'm not getting my cord all tangled up. 

Feels like an actual professional waver not cheaply made at all and like it wouldn't easily break. The ceramic coating on each barrel is definitely a major pro for me. I have damaged ends and this doesn't feel like it adds damage and I don't get that fried feeling. I always make sure I put heat protectant on, but the ceramic coating puts my mind at ease that I'm not causing more damage to my hair. It's versatile you can do looser waves or you can section smaller pieces to get a tighter more defined wave. There is no need for hairspray unless your hair is extremely straight and doesn't hold styles at all. Curls typically fall after a few hours in my hair and even WITHOUT hairspray my hair is still wavy after 8 hours.

Con- The price. It's pricier than most wavers I will say that, but the quality is definitely there and it seems worth it to me to pay a little extra to not fry your hair, keep it styled all day, and to have a product that will hold up and not break on you in a couple weeks. Treat yourself once in a while! 

I have mermaid hair and I love it and I highly recommend this waver!
faceoff_positive.headline: Mermaid hair in minutes! Love this waver!

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I was really excited to test out a 3 barrel waver, and ghd has a great reputation for being a great hair tool brand.  First off, the packaging is beautiful and simple.  The barrel itself is weighted, and it makes it feel like quality, but it's almost too heavy.  The barrels themselves are a more natural shape than just simply round - and I imagine that the waves this would create would be more "beachy" wave.   I have straight, hard to curl hair, but it does curl.  However, this product did not keep the wave it first created in my hair for much longer than a few minutes.  After an hour, it just looked like I had some random kinks in my hair.  Also, I find this product very difficult to use on yourself.  It is hard to see where you should bring the waver down to next on your hair strand.  And like I said earlier, this is HEAVY!  I wanted to love this ghd waver so much, however this is just not for my straight hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me and my straight hair
